function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of investigation into negative aspects of gated communities as pandemic protection solutions","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient medical evidence on the impact of gated communities on covid-19 infection rate","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of market study on expected demand for gated communities in post-pandemic era","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Continuous spread of the virus","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supply chain complications and logistic bottlenecks","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workforce issues and labor shortage","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Projects necessary for the delivery of health care services, such as hospitals, health-care facilities, and pharmaceutical manufacturing facilities.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Affordable-housing residential projects.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing at construction sites","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Supply chain challenges and workforce shortages","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented changes and responses to business, economic, and social aspects due to the pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in the effects of the pandemic on the construction sector based on state suggestions","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the severity and duration of the crisis","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges faced by construction industry stakeholders due to Covid-19","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear guidance on best practices for construction industry recovery","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confusion and uncertainty about dealing with the pandemic on construction jobsites","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of the pandemic on the construction industry","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of definite construction-related guidelines and best practices for pandemic management","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases in the construction industry","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic impact of business failures in the construction industry","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unemployment and labor availability in the construction industry","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of guidelines and protocols for handling covid-19 cases within the construction industry","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate awareness and compliance with covid-19 safety measures among construction workers","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Workforce reductions through furloughs, layoffs, and terminations","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived long-term viability concerns for organizations","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantial decrease in commercial water use, commuter traffic, and airport activity leading to lower revenues for infrastructure projects.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharp decrease in transportation revenues and decline in gas tax receipts.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential permanent decline in the appeal of public transportation and shared ride modes due to fear of infections.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 in the construction industry due to lack of guidelines and best practices.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reviewing industry guidelines and best practices from various organizations may lead to inconsistent or conflicting information.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Forced remote work due to the pandemic may lead to negative psychological impacts on construction industry participants.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive force majeure clauses in construction contracts may lead to uncertainty in dealing with the impacts of the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on outdated guidelines and recommendations from well-established organizations","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement and oversight in implementing safety standards","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate training and education on best practices for disease prevention in construction jobsites","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Workplace safety inspections are shown to reduce injury rates and costs, but the impact of osha guidelines on covid-19 exposure risk is not specified.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapidly changing guidance from major agencies like cdc and osha may lead to confusion and implementation errors.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to safety steps before shifts start","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of job site hygiene","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing at the job site","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through construction sites due to lack of adherence to guidelines","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of education and awareness about best practices in dealing with the pandemic in the construction industry","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of personal hygiene practices on jobsite","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing measures on jobsite","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of management of sick employees","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stacking of workforce trades","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclean surfaces of service and fleet vehicles","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Management of sick employees","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Companies not implementing or updating policies to follow cdc, osha, and local guidelines","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of worker training to prevent disease spread in geographic areas","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"}]}
